extendedInfo.description: * Please update to the latest version to avoid any issues in enjoying the Career Mode.Experience the most vivid game of golf ever!Introducing Golf Starâ¢, the greatest golf game youâll ever play, featuring realistic graphics, golfing techniques mastered by the pros, and a simulation powered by real physics-based gameplay. Experience the authenticity of the course in the most realistic online golf game ever!It doesnât get any realer than this! Stunning graphics!- Golf Star proudly features stunningly beautiful graphics unlike anything youâve ever seen before.- High quality graphics and lighting technology surpass all other Full 3D Golf games. - Experience the exhilarating feeling of being on a real golf course!True-to-Life Golf Physics- Terrain height, ball impact angle, wind, temperature, humidity, and up to 70 other factors implemented to perfectly capture the physics of a real swing. - Go ahead and take a shot to experience all of the physical elements found in a real-life game of golf! Various Skills and Techniques- Weâve captured the skills and techniques of real-life pro golfers. - Become a Pro Golfer and choose from up to 10 techniques to use, including draw shots, fade shots, and chip shots. 3 Different Game Modes- Career Mode: Play Single Player rounds and Quests, or compete in the NPC Tournament. - 1:1 Match Mode: Compete against golfers from all around the world. - Online Match Mode: Play against up to 10 other players online in a real-time competition. Sweep the online competition! Weekly Rankings Against Friends- Add friends to partake in a rivalry of talents. - Climb to the top of the rankings to hold a trophy in your arms!The most exciting part of golfing, Golf Tournaments!- Play a new tournament every week, and win prizes. - Become the worldâs greatest Pro Golfer, and achieve the Grand Slam.Challenge yourself to be the best!- Complete exciting quests and achievements.- Become a Legend and be inducted into the Hall of Fame.Unique Characters - Collect fun outfits and accessories. - Show off your unique style to friends.ââââââââââââââââCom2uS: Your first search for fun!Check out these other exciting games by Com2uS!âââââââââââââââTiny Pop: A new super exciting bubble shooter!9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball: The Ultimate Baseball game!Tiny Farm: A Tiny Farm right in the palm of your hands!Heroes Warâ¢: Assemble the ultimate force of heroes to save the world!Defense Technica: Think you know Tower Defense? reviews.title: Fun, Best I\'ve tried yet.
reviews.comment: Worth a look. Game play is good. Don\'t card for the gimmicky Facebook invites and all that.
reviews.author: Aaron Kangas

reviews.title: IGood game
reviews.comment: Takes awhile to install and load but worth the wait. One of the better golf games on Android. Lots of fun.
reviews.author: Ralph Niederlander Jr.

reviews.title: Awesome fun and more fun
reviews.comment: This is a must have for all golfers, great graphics smooth play and very entertaining...
reviews.author: G.S.T Aunch

reviews.title: Amazing game
reviews.comment: Brilliant graphics and one of the best free golfing games I\'ve played. Well done
reviews.author: Paul Sharp

reviews.title: Great game. a must for anyone that loves the game
reviews.comment: The game play is smooth and cosistent. while i feel the price of optional purchases is way too high for a game, its definately a game i will continue to play and enjoy
reviews.author: Mick Grieve

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: So far so good... fun and challenging.  Very realistic. Very good for a free app
reviews.author: Joshua Wiley

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: So far I\'ve really loved my experience playing this game.  It\'s beautiful and fun and I love that I can play against other people.
reviews.author: Crystal Schaeffer

reviews.title: The BEST EVER!
reviews.comment: I love this game so much i want to marry this game. Graphic superb, gameplay superclass PS3 kinda suspense & all round fun. This is an Award Winning Game!
reviews.author: zack mohamed

reviews.title: Very impressed
reviews.comment: By far the best mobile gaming golf experience around.  Online multiplayer VERY functional. Smooth and extremely competitive.  UI could afford to be less busy but all in all very nice.
reviews.author: James Burandt

reviews.title: One of the best
reviews.comment: One of the best and most realistic golf game around. A must for golf lovers
reviews.author: Keith Chan

reviews.title: Good game and good graphics
reviews.comment: Easy to play and very realistic, love playing it.
reviews.author: Lee Merrett

reviews.title: Very realistic
reviews.comment: By far the most realistic golf game I have played on android. It is on par with the other golf games on  games consoles and pc really good graphics nice smooth running and very addictive.
reviews.author: john murray

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love the smooth flow and ease of controlling every aspect of the game.  Great work on this one!
reviews.author: Santiago Loetz

reviews.title: Addictive game.
reviews.comment: A must for all golf fans and worth a try for non golf fans. Smooth, vibrant graphics and a gameplay that keeps you glued. Well done.
reviews.author: Paul Hillsden

reviews.title: a great game
reviews.comment: Great true to life game.  Highly addictive and a lot of fun to play.  Real life physics make this a realistic game.
reviews.author: Michael Odier

reviews.title: Awesome Golf Game
reviews.comment: Very enjoyable game. Offers just the right amount of fun and challenge.
reviews.author: Donnie Wright

reviews.title: Addictive yet super FUN
reviews.comment: One of the best golf game on thee internet. Very addictive and most of all FUN. The graphic is amazing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: Very good with great graphics!  Would love better explanation about hearts, stars, etc. when next version comes out.
reviews.author: Bill Hale

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: A fun reasonably easy game to play with extremely good graphics. Easy to get hooked in a good way
reviews.author: Tony Goffett

reviews.title: Great gameplay
reviews.comment: For a free app, except for buying the usual extra possibilities, this is a great game, easy to understand gameplay and nice graphics, online play works smooth!!!!
reviews.author: Onoma Nunn
